This isn't just a history lesson. This is all going to become a reality in America, within the next handful of years. That's where you live.
With legislation to “prevent economic disruption”, they will outlaw categories of protest and demonstration.
With voter-fraud investigations, gerrymandering, and new “fraud-prevention” identification laws, they'll deprive minorities of the vote.
Then, the next step is the state of emergency, or the Enabling Act. Then the extraordinary legislation. And then the rounding-up begins.
The next step is obtaining an excuse to seize Muslims (etc) already in the US. There _will_ be a Reichstag fire. They'll set it themselves.
Naturally. When you've destroyed your own country, there will be no shortage of devils ready with deals. https://t.co/mwLpNxzWWy
